# **sys-info**
Node.js system resource monitoring module

## Getting Started
```
git clone -b sys-info/master https://github.com/amuzlab/node-module.git sys-info
npm install
```

### Requires
* [Node.js 8.X 이상 버전](https://nodejs.org/en/docs/)

### Installing
```
npm login
npm install @amuzlab/sys-info --save
```

### Branch naming convention
```
git branch sys-info/<sub branch name>

ex) git branch sys-info/master
ex) git branch sys-info/develop
```

### Annotated tag naming convention
```
git tag -a sys-info/<tag name>

ex) git tag -a sys-info/1.0.0
```

### Create docs
```
npm run create-doc
```

### Create package
```
npm pack
```

### Example
```
const utils = require('@amuzlab/utils'),
    sysInfo = require('../index')({
        useGPU: true,
        isDisplayUnit: false
    })

utils.go(
    null,
    () => sysInfo.gpu.gpus
        .then(gpus => console.log(JSON.stringify(gpus, null, '\t')))
        .catch(err => console.error(err)),
    () => sysInfo.gpu.getGPU('ROUND_ROBIN')
    .then(gpu => console.log('getGPU ROUND_ROBIN =>', JSON.stringify(gpu, null, '\t')))
    .catch(err => console.error('getGPU ROUND_ROBIN ERROR =>', err)),
    () => sysInfo.gpu.getGPU('PROCESS_COUNT')
    .then(gpu => console.log('getGPU PROCESS_COUNT =>', JSON.stringify(gpu, null, '\t')))
    .catch(err => console.error('getGPU PROCESS_COUNT ERROR =>', err)),
    () => sysInfo.gpu.getGPU('MEMORY_USAGE')
    .then(gpu => console.log('getGPU MEMORY_USAGE =>', JSON.stringify(gpu, null, '\t')))
    .catch(err => console.error('getGPU MEMORY_USAGE ERROR =>', err)),
    () => sysInfo.gpu.getGPU(0)
    .then(gpu => console.log('getGPU DEVICE NUMBER =>', JSON.stringify(gpu, null, '\t')))
    .catch(err => console.error('getGPU DEVICE NUMBER ERROR =>', err)),
    () => sysInfo.gpu.getGPU(gpu => gpu.deviceNo === 0)
    .then(gpu => console.log('getGPU CALLBACK =>', JSON.stringify(gpu, null, '\t')))
    .catch(err => console.error('getGPU CALLBACK ERROR =>', err)),
    () => sysInfo.gpu.persistance.isEnablePersistanceMode()
    .then(isEnable => console.log('isEnablePersistanceMode =>', isEnable))
    .catch(err => console.error('isEnablePersistanceMode ERROR =>', err)),
    () => sysInfo.gpu.persistance.isEnablePersistanceMode(0)
    .then(isEnable => console.log('isEnablePersistanceMode device no : 0 =>', isEnable))
    .catch(err => console.error('isEnablePersistanceMode device no : 0 ERROR =>', err)),
    () => sysInfo.gpu.getGPU('ROUND_ROBIN')
    .then(gpu => console.log('getGPU ROUND_ROBIN =>', JSON.stringify(gpu, null, '\t')))
    .catch(err => console.error('getGPU ROUND_ROBIN ERROR =>', err))
//    () => sysInfo.gpu.persistance.setEnablePersistanceMode()
//    .then(isEnable => console.log('setEnablePersistanceMode =>', isEnable))
//    .catch(err => console.error('setEnablePersistanceMode ERROR =>', err))
)
```
